name: ZOE HD
description: The Games on Demand version supports English, French, Italian, German, Spanish,Portuguese. Download the manual for this game by locating the game on http://marketplace.xbox.com and selecting “See Game Manual". The HD remastering process has made Z.O.E. even more striking, re-igniting the thrills for long-time fans and blowing away those discovering the game for the first time. Either way, players will find a combination of hardcore gameplay and compelling story that has become all too rare in this day and age.
